name.description: The name of the query parameter.

value.description: The value of the query parameter.

fromExpression.description: An expression to evaluate to extract the output from the HTTP response.

method.description: The HTTP method to use for the request.

url.description: The URL to send the HTTP request to.

headers.description: Headers to include in the HTTP request.

queryParams.description: Query parameters to include in the HTTP request.

body.description: The body of the HTTP request.

insecureSkipTLSVerify.description: Whether to skip TLS verification when making the request. (Not recommended.)

timeoutSeconds.description: The number of seconds to wait for the request to complete. If not specified, the default is 10 seconds.

outputs.description: Outputs to extract from the HTTP response.

successExpression.description: An expression to evaluate to determine if the request was successful.

failureExpression.description: An expression to evaluate to determine if the request failed.
